description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2rbqt","text":"Ecdysteroids are arthropod steroid hormones that are primarily involved in insect moulting. In arthropod vectors, especially in mosquitoes, ecdysteroids of interest include mainly ecdysone (E) and 20-hydroxyecdysone (20E). These two compounds are involved in several important biological processes. Targeting these compounds and their regulatory pathways could lead to the characterisation of novel genetic tools towards implementing new malaria control strategies. To date, there are two main methods for quantifying E and 20E. These methods include an enzymatic method (Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA)) and a chromatographic method (High-Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC)). However, for ecdysteroids quantification, the HPLC methods available in literature go from 30 minutes to one hour. Here, we developed a short HPLC gradient method for 20-hydroxyecdysone quantification in the malaria vector Anopheles gambiae. This method was developed specifically when sample material is limited as well as to save time and cost. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":916,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ih7o","text":"A new column has to be equilibrated in the mobile phase for at least 1-2 hours before use and any buffer should be removed from the column daily with 20% methanol or Acetonitrile: 80% HPLC grade water and stored in 80% methanol or Acetonitrile: 20% HPLC grade water. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9holp","text":"The partial loop option should be chosen (\"μL-pickup\") for sample analysis to inject sample volumes as little as 1μL, resulting in no sample wastage and to avoid large volumes of standard sample preparation.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kv25","text":"All samples and mobile phase buffers should be filtered through a 0.45 um filter prior to being analysed.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kfhk","text":"The 20E synthesis in mosquitoes is tightly regulated. To quantify the 20E in non-blood feed mosquitoes, be sure that female mosquitoes have sufficient time for mating to occur. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nrco","text":"All organic mobile phases used for HPLC analysis should be HPLC grade (Sigma Aldridge Inc).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi73o","text":"All other chemicals and standards should be of the highest purity grade (Sigma Aldridge Inc.)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"62dsr","text":"Analytical HPLC separations were performed on the Flexar LC system (Perkin Elmer) with a UV/Vis Detector and a Phenomenex Kinetex RP C18–5 µm column (4.6 x 150 mm). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"294hd","text":"The detection wavelength was set at 254 nm. steps.section: Linearity, Limit of Detection (LOD) and Limit of Quantification (LOQ)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"egt11","text":"Example of calculation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frsjb","text":"     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cuvj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rq3m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4mbc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"744E03F040DE11EC977DA7FF9AEA5DEC","height":233,"id":184924,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwu8bntu7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwu6bntu7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwu7bntu7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwu5bntu7.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"91E05BC040DE11EC977DA7FF9AEA5DEC","height":116,"id":184928,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwvcbntu7.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwvabntu7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwvbbntu7.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/fwu9bntu7.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c2gaj","text":"In the \"SD of intercept\" calculation formula, \"N\" represents the total number of the standard samples.  ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fin1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dlkn","text":"20-hydroxyecdysone (20E) was detected in total ecdysteroid extract from only female mosquitoes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3frao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e0ch","text":"Here, female mosquitoes of Anopheles gambiae (COGS strain) were used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rvq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dj1p","text":"Total ecdysteroid was extracted using methanol according to the method described by McKinney et al., 2017.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d84p0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9ops","text":"homogenize 15 non-blood fed adult females (4 days old) in1 mL of methanol 95% in 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes using plastic pestles. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sj25","text":"Vortex and centrifuge for 5 min at 13000xg ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6ik5","text":"Transfer the supernatant to another tube","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a31ga","text":"Homogenize the remaining pellet in 500 µL of methanol 95% and centrifuge","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1roi5","text":"Poole the supernatant with the first one. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aebiu","text":"Dry the pooled supernatants in a vacuum centrifuge ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bq46","text":"Resuspend the dried sample in 500 µL of methanol 100% and filter the solution before injection.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"McKinney DA, Strand MR, Brown MR","can_edit":1,"date":"1509494400","doi":"https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ygcen.2017.08.028","guid":"BE41531030EC11ECB4B6B12F79282C43","id":1370,"journal":"General and comparative endocrinology","protocol_id":"0","title":"Evaluation of ecdysteroid antisera for a competitive enzyme immunoassay and extraction procedures for the measurement of mosquito ecdysteroids"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"577o7","text":"HPLC analysis of the extracts","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nloo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekcgm","text":"Inject the sample using the same method as with the standard samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bcig","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeej4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1t578","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5cvnd","text":"For the HPLC analysis, it was observed that with the 1 µL injection volume the interpolated X value (the concentration of the sample) falls outside the output range of X for the fitted curve. We then recommend analysing the mosquito extracts with at least 5 µL injection volume and reporting the calculated concentration to 1 µL injection by dividing the calculated value by a factor of 5.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
